attributes.title: How Enlightenment Is Delivered
attributes.description: Todayâ€™s (23May15) Nithya Satsang on Kathopanishad from Varanasi, Paramahamsa Nithyananda enters into vividly narrating how the Cosmic space is created for the delivery of Enlightenment, the Reality. With the Shanti Mantra, peace invocation, he sets the context for future vision for Indian Education System, which comes from the right past. One needs to prepare for Death to prepare for Life. Unhearing the cries of a powerless disciple who feels the pain of human existence, a Master needs to insensitively deliver the Truth as it is. Yama Dharma,  who does the perfect full-time job of granting Death, the most important reality of humans, is uncompromising in revealing the Akashic Records on Death. Because of the authenticity of Naciketa, one of the greatest disciples who happened on earth, and the intensity of Yama Dharma as the Master, the space is created for Enlightenment to be delivered by the Cosmos.
